document.full_text: high world oil futures prices could rise yet further if the european union puts sanctions on syrian oil this week, although the country exports modest amounts and the quality is low, analysts and traders said.
document.title: sanctions on small producer syria may buoy oil
lines_and_colors: high world oil futures prices could rise yet further if the european union puts sanctions on syrian oil this week, although the country exports modest amounts and the quality is low, analysts and traders said.
